title: Ticket #4943: Include same environment variables in ssh_to_job as the batch job
description:
The intent is for the environment of ssh_to_job to be the same as the batch job. But looking at the code, it appears that the below environment variables are likely to be missing/different between a vanilla batch job and an ssh_to_job session. We should improve this so that all the environment variables below are set the same for processes launched via a vanilla batch job or launched via an ssh_to_job session. See this request from Icecube.

Missing from ssh_to_job compared to a vanilla batch job: 

  _CONDOR_MACHINE_AD
  _CONDOR_JOB_AD
  _CONDOR_CHIRP_CONFIG
  _CONDOR_WRAPPER_ERROR_FILE
  _CHIRP_DELAYED_UPDATE_PREFIX

Missing from vanilla batch job compared to ssh_to_job: 

  _CONDOR_SLOT_NAME
  _CONDOR_SHELL

In addition to the above, see #5008 for additional future related work.
